property.name: nifi.version
property.description: The version number of the current release.

property.name: nifi.flow.configuration.archive.max.time
property.description: The lifespan of archived flow.xml files. NiFi will delete expired archive files when it updates flow.xml if this property is specified. Expiration is determined based on current system time and the last modified timestamp of an archived flow.xml. If no archive limitation is specified in nifi.properties, NiFi removes archives older than "30 days".

property.name: nifi.flow.configuration.archive.max.storage
property.description: The total data size allowed for the archived flow.xml files. NiFi will delete the oldest archive files until the total archived file size becomes less than this configuration value, if this property is specified. If no archive limitation is specified in nifi.properties, NiFi uses "500 MB" for this.

property.name: nifi.flow.configuration.archive.max.count
property.description: The number of archive files allowed. NiFi will delete the oldest archive files so that only N latest archives can be kept, if this property is specified.

property.name: nifi.web.http.network.interface.default
property.description: The name of the network interface to which NiFi should bind for HTTP requests.

property.name: nifi.web.https.network.interface.default
property.description: The name of the network interface to which NiFi should bind for HTTPS requests. It is blank by default.

property.name: nifi.provenance.repository.debug.frequency
property.description: nifi.provenance.repository.debug.frequency Controls the number of events processed between DEBUG statements documenting the performance metrics of the repository. This value is only used when DEBUG level statements are enabled in the log configuration.

property.name: nifi.provenance.repository.encryption.key.provider.implementation
property.description: This is the fully-qualified class name of the key provider.

property.name: nifi.provenance.repository.encryption.key.provider.location
property.description: The path to the key definition resource (empty for StaticKeyProvider, ./keys.nkp or similar path for FileBasedKeyProvider)

property.name: nifi.provenance.repository.encryption.key.id
property.description: The active key ID to use for encryption (e.g. Key1).

property.name: nifi.provenance.repository.encryption.key
property.description: The key to use for StaticKeyProvider
